summary: Okay but imagine if monica was captain marvel in the mcu. Then we would have sam wilson as cap and tchalla as black panther....
body: Okay but imagine if monica was captain marvel in the mcu. Then we would have sam wilson as cap and tchalla as black panther. These 3 would lead the avengers like 3 black people leading one of the most popular superhero teams out there

Hi, I'm Nel. I'm a chinese-sundanese-javanese Indonesian with German ancestors whose heart was left in New York. 
I love cats. And I talk to my plants. 
Partial photographer and a cook, but just basically a gamer girl.

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

blog.name: microwaveddrabbles
blog.title: Alie
blog.description:
Hi! I'm Alie (she/her) and I write microwaved drabbles, like microwaved food, they differ in quality.
Let's chat: Asks&Messages are always open!

title: Falling Star (Carol Danvers x Reader)
body:
Summary: Reader x Carol Danvers post-breakup. R is having an especially rough time and decides to go for a walk in the middle of the night. She encounters a falling star and makes a wish.

Word count: 700 something

Warnings: Angst, mentions of loneliness, indications of depression

A/N: (7-6-19) HEY! I was listening to Diamond Heart by Alan Walker ft. Sophia Somajo today and it gave me this idea. I hope you like it (it would be super awesome if you could leave some feedback or a ‘like’ so I know at least one person has read my little drabble, thank you so much ily) (also, shoutout to @cant-control-their-fear-imagines for making me post this HAHA) 

‘I’m sorry. I just can’t do this, not anymore.’ The harsh words you spoke that cursed night had been carved into Carol’s memory. Never did she think that the one thing she loved most could end up hurting her so much. As unbreakable as her physique might have been, her heart remained breakable- simple, human. She often reminisces about the good times you had had together. Dinner dates, movie nights, and her personal favorite, star gazing. For hours you’d lay side by side, studying the constellations in the sky whilst Carol told you about her heroic acts in places far beyond what you could imagine. The future you had once mapped out together slowly crumbled apart, with every argument and night spent apart, another tear was created. It took months for you to give in, tired of fighting, tired of trying to pretend something so broken could be mended. It had hurt you- tremendously, but you knew there was no other way, not for you.

‘I miss her. I miss her so much, it burns. I can feel it in my whole being. Is this heartbreak? Is this grief? Sometimes I wonder if I will be okay, whether I did the right thing. Perhaps what I’m experiencing now was inevitable- whatever this was, it was going to break me. Perhaps the only difference I have made here is that the pieces that I am now left with still fit together. Not perfect, nor beautiful, but functional. They say love is for everyone, to never lose hope. I say they are silly and that there is no point in putting the happiness you have created for yourself on the line for someone else.’ You sigh, closing your notebook that, by now, was decorated with splatters of salty liquid from previous “emotional outbursts” as you liked to call them. After breaking up with Carol you decided to do everything you can to make sure you would never love again. Love was all fun and games but this had taken its toll on you. Stretching your limbs, you look up at the ceiling briefly before getting up and making your way to the front door. It was late to still be going out for a walk but you couldn’t bring yourself to care much. Your caring for things, in general, had disappeared almost completely, just enough to keep you alive was plenty you decided.

About an hour of wandering later you found yourself in a small meadow, giving you full access to the sky you weren’t able to see in full previously, as the trees had been blocking your view. ‘That’s beautiful’ you thought to yourself while looking at the sparkling lights in the sky. A sad smile was present on your face. After Carol nothing had been the same, nothing would ever be the same. Even the sky, as glorious and mesmerizing it was, was not left unaffected. You sit down, to give your legs a rest but your position changes to you laying down, hands folded over your chest and eyes focused on the stars, about a minute in.

‘Do you see that one?’ Carol asked you. ‘Which one?’ ‘The brightest one.’ You hummed in response. ‘That star to the sky is what you are to me. You outshine everything else, you are the brightest thing I have ever known in my life, Y/N. I need you to remember that.’

Before you could stop yourself, tears formed in your eyes once again. You were too broken to stop them and you felt everything all over again, wishing for the pain to stop. It was in that moment that a falling star zoomed through the sky, temporarily lighting up your dark surroundings. You squeezed your eyes shut and whispered ‘I wish for all this pain to be over, to finally be happy and whole again.’ Little did you know that that “falling star” was once the love of your life. If only your vision hadn’t been blurred by your tears, perhaps you then would have seen the truth. The truth that Carol had been keeping tabs on you because she, too, had never been able to fully let go.

summary: Just realized my two main ships at the moment are Danbeau and Villaneve, which are like the epitome of healthy and unhealthy,...
body:
Just realized my two main ships at the moment are Danbeau and Villaneve, which are like the epitome of healthy and unhealthy, respectively.

We all must have balance in our lives, friends.

summary: Here’s fight choreographer and stunt man Felix Betancourt’s pre-viz for Avengers: Endgame. The first is his vision for Hawkeye...
caption:
Here’s fight choreographer and stunt man Felix Betancourt’s pre-viz for Avengers: Endgame.
The first is his vision for Hawkeye versus Black Widow and the second is Captain Marvel versus Thanos.
I’m always amazedbyt what they can accomplish in these clips. Oh and the lady in the first clip is Heidi Moneymaker, Scarlett Johansson’s real-life stunt double.

summary: Okay but that scene of Carol saying goodbye to her family and Maria saying, “Go on” and Carol nodding/smiling knowing she has...
body: Okay but that scene of Carol saying goodbye to her family and Maria saying, “Go on” and Carol nodding/smiling knowing she has her loved ones’ support to do what she has to do… it reminds me so strongly of the Peter/MJ scene at the end of Spider-Man 2 where they’re kissing and he hears the sirens, but she’s just like, “Go get ‘em, Tiger.” THE ROMANTIC PARALLELS, I CAN’T!!

reblog.comment: Okay but that scene of Carol saying goodbye to her family and Maria saying, “Go on” and Carol nodding/smiling knowing she has her loved ones’ support to do what she has to do… it reminds me so strongly of the Peter/MJ scene at the end of Spider-Man 2 where they’re kissing and he hears the sirens, but she’s just like, “Go get ‘em, Tiger.” THE ROMANTIC PARALLELS, I CAN’T!!

trail.content_raw: Okay but that scene of Carol saying goodbye to her family and Maria saying, “Go on” and Carol nodding/smiling knowing she has her loved ones’ support to do what she has to do… it reminds me so strongly of the Peter/MJ scene at the end of Spider-Man 2 where they’re kissing and he hears the sirens, but she’s just like, “Go get ‘em, Tiger.” THE ROMANTIC PARALLELS, I CAN’T!!
trail.content: Okay but that scene of Carol saying goodbye to her family and Maria saying, “Go on” and Carol nodding/smiling knowing she has her loved ones’ support to do what she has to do… it reminds me so strongly of the Peter/MJ scene at the end of Spider-Man 2 where they’re kissing and he hears the sirens, but she’s just like, “Go get ‘em, Tiger.” THE ROMANTIC PARALLELS, I CAN’T!!

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)
